page.title: 17RELIGION IN WATCHET 1985
page.content: In Watchet there are five churches,Roman Catholic, Salvation Army, St.Decuman's (Church of England),Methodist, Baptist. About a third of our school go to a church or Sunday School. St. Decuman's Church is on a hill and the Methodist is in the town.The Baptist and the Salvation Army is very close to each other.One has a graveyard and that is St.Decumans Church and the only church with a{tower}and{bells. {ST.DECUMAN'S CHURCH}- is outside Watchet.The name of the vicar is{Rev. {Mr. Barnett.}The church has a graveyard.All ages of people go to church.St.Decumans church has a choir they sing hymns in the services which last one hour and 10 minutes.About 120 people go to the main services and the vicar gets Â£120 collection.The church is 33m long,23m wide and 75m high.
